description: Try our easy to follow Crumbed Lamb Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crumbed Lamb Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, coriander, salt and pepper in a bowl. Whisk egg and kecap manis together in a shallow bowl. Place flour on a plate.
Lightly dust cutlets with flour, dip into egg mixture and coat well with breadcrumbs. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat and cook cutlets for 2-3 minutes each side until golden. Remove from pan. Serve with a green salad. Note: To make fresh breadcrumbs, process day-old bread in a food processor.
